overview: Yossi is co-founder of MagPointer, a software company developing apps that improve the way PowerPoint presentations are presented. Yossi is also managing corporate development for PH7, a UK -based investment firm. Previously, he was CEO and Founder of TakeCare, a provider of online personality and risk assessments of Nannies, Au Pairs and Babysitters. Before founding TakeCare, Yossi served as VP Sales & Marketing for Nemesysco, where he gained significant experience in the field of credibility assessment and integrity tests. Prior to Nemesysco, he has held the positions of VPSales & Marketing at SkyVision, VP of EMEA for Expand Networks and Director of Sales & Business Development for Tadiran Telecom. Yossi holds a B.Sc. in Electrical Engineering from the Technion Institute of Technology and an MBA from Henley Management College in the UK.
